name: Twomb ii
description:
Twomb ii is an interactive audio-visual study.

4 Sets, a collection of Symbols & a myriad of ways to create your own musical arrangements.

A very short experience.

  • Mouse - click on interactions and rotate the cube
  • Open the solution UI to arrange audio sequence
  • Select a solution circle and then select the symbol you want placed inside. When all symbols have been used, you can play your arrangement.
  • ESC - open main menu
